onyomiExamples.meaning: holiday, day off, furlough, absence (from work)
regular holiday, fixed day off, regular closing day

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to be absent, to take a day off, to rest, to have a break, to go to bed, to (lie down to) sleep, to turn in, to retire, to stop doing some ongoing activity for a time, to suspend business
to be rested, to feel at ease, to repose, to be relieved
to rest, to suspend, to give relief
